__e: It reminded me that a little wind never hurt anyone.
The amazing thing is that in the dream I didn't remember he was dead.
And then when I got here, it was almost like I'd been here before. And for some reason, Hugo, I have a memory of you being here, too.
I guess you could say my ears are bigger than my pockets.
When I told you I didn't remember killing your wife or your little girl.
I forgot it was in my briefcase and now don't know where it is, so it's probably with whoever I went home with.
I was so wasted, I didn't even really remember hitting that girl until a week later.
I don't even remember you of whoever you say that whore was you say I killed.
How could I, when I'd forgotten who I was, until two months ago?
